HotelElement.Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Bogota - Calle 100

Description.Text: The hotel set in a quiet neighborhood in the financial district, the hotel is just a 10-minute walk to Zona Rosa shops, dining and nightlife. Just 6 km from Bogota city center and 19 km from El Dorado International Airport.

Calle 100 Restaurant - Enjoy delectable dining at our restaurant. If you*re looking for dining options during your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Calle 100 join us at our Restaurant where you*ll find various selections. It is open daily for breakfast lunch and dinner. If you just want to relax with a warm beverage ligh.
